content: description the ocean point cardigan is perfect for those who love boho style and beach vibes this pattern features an oversized fit and unique triangle shapes at the bottom it is versatile and looks great on a wide range of body shapes and sizes this cardigan is quick to make using several tall stitches and also includes a video tutorial this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your cardigan plus a free copy of the pdf digital download crochet pattern you can even customize your yarn color this cardigan pattern also has a full video tutorial on my youtube channel 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-ocean-point-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/44o05 3 https //youtu be/7lgnbnw2tvy
